# MTLDataType.r8Unorm

**Case**

An ordinary pixel with one component that’s an 8-bit, normalized, unsigned integer value.

## Declaration

```swift
case r8Unorm
```

## 8-bit pixel format types

- **MTLDataType.r8Snorm**: An ordinary pixel with one component that’s an 8-bit, normalized, signed integer value.
